Name: Canvas
Review Text: Very cozy and lovely cafe and rooftop as well. The cafe downstairs looks like a nice place to work on days where not so many meetings are going on. The rooftop has an impressive view, definitely the kind of place where to bring your friends ‚Ä¶

Name: Canvas
Review Text:
Place is amazing. It has good vibes. View is also good. It's located on 7th floor and the staff is super friendly.
There is not much variety in the food and drinks. Also I didn't like the cold ‚Ä¶

Name: Canvas
Review Text: Very nice bar with beautyful view on the city of Amsterdam. We had an Aperol Spritz, it was small but done in the right ptoportions. Personnel was super kind, for instance they were almost closing and so they told us asking if it was fine. ‚Ä¶

Name: Canvas
Review Text: It is really nice, good food, good environment and sympathize staff.

Name: Canvas
Review Text:
A really pretty location and the staff is extremely nice.
Unfortunately, we didn‚Äôt enjoy the food as much. It took about 5 mins for us to get our main courses but we had to wait 20 mins for us to get the bread we had ‚Ä¶

Name: Canvas
Review Text:
Lunch experience was excellent. Price/quality ratio very good, expecially given the unique location. Service was nice, did not bother too much but still payed attention when you needed something.
Would recommend.

Name: Canvas
Review Text:
Unfortunately we ate our food before i could make a photo üòÑ
We had chicken wings with fries and red beet with blue cheese salad. It was delicious! ü§§ ‚Ä¶

Name: Canvas
Review Text: Nice dinner all great heights. The cheese plate was a bit disappointing though. The view is great!

Name: Canvas
Review Text: Great place, great view, but be careful when you go to the bathroom. There's a feeling of no privacy.

Name: Canvas
Review Text: For starters, really don‚Äôt recommend their artichoke(horrible) and meatball(not that good). We didn‚Äôt order main food, so can‚Äôt comment on it. However, the view is awesome, and the music is always good there.

Name: Canvas
Review Text: Canvas is the restaurant on the top floor of the Volkshotel in the former Volkskrant building. Can be reached very easily by Metro 51, 53 or 54 from Central Station. It serves pretty good food and gorgeous cocktails ... has a relaxed vibe ‚Ä¶

Name: Canvas
Review Text: Just the view from the 7th floor was worth a visit! The place was very busy on a Friday night but the staff was efficient and attentive. The wait for the food very reasonable. I loved the salad with a dressing with just a hint of onion, and I ate asparagus bearnaise and they were good. Definitely recommend this play! just at the subway.

Name: Canvas
Review Text:
Lovely dinner spot with great views of the city!
Dinner was great and the staff were very very kind, and Genuine. The chicken wings appetizer was very good and the stammpot was worth trying! The cheesecake was delicious!
Would recommend!

Name: Canvas
Review Text: Great cocktails and view of Amsterdam. I went here in the middle of the week and it was very empty but still lots of fun. You have to take the elevator on the left side after entering the building to get up.

Name: Canvas
Review Text: Nice rooftop location. Ok food, but definitely would recommend for the complete experience.

Name: Canvas
Review Text: After 1 hour waiting they served us small portions of food. If you're a gnome or a hobbit it's okay. If you're a person you'll have to eat kebab afterwards.

Name: Canvas
Review Text: One place to go if you are looking for a rooftop. Amazing views and nice menu

Name: Canvas
Review Text: Nice roof terrace in Amsterdam East on the Top floor of Volks Hotel. Great 180 degree view of Amsterdam. Normal prices , friendly staff.

Name: Canvas
Review Text: A view with good food, environment,  friendly staff,... and so much more.

Name: Canvas
Review Text: Great staff, good food. But it took desert 20 minutes to turn up?!

Name: Canvas
Review Text: Tiny portions and very poor quality. Store bought ingredients - nothing fresh. It's not worth the price you pay.

Name: Canvas
Review Text: Nice rooftop place, good food. Very fast but also a bit unpersonal staff. Nice experience overall

Name: Canvas
Review Text: I really like it. Great food and view.

Name: Canvas
Review Text: Nice location for drinks with an outdoor terrace. The service on the terrace is slow, but the cocktails were nice. Their menu offers plenty of vegan options and the staff inside is much more attentive and service oriented. They are very ‚Ä¶

Name: Canvas
Review Text: Very affordable drinks and nice vibe but the view isn't as nice as I thought it would be

Name: Canvas
Review Text: Beautiful views, fabulous food and great service

Name: Canvas
Review Text: I was staying in the Volkshotel so I went to Canvas for breakfast. The sunrises over Amsterdam were awesome (see the attached photo). The food was good, about what you find in most EU hotels that offer breakfast: yogurt, various breads, cheeses, cuts of meat, eggs, bacon, cereal, and so on.

Name: Canvas
Review Text: We booked a table for dinner last Sunday for 2 people, when arriving we got assigned to a bench with a little side table, we asked the waitress that brought us there if we could have the (normal) table in front of us, im pregnant and to eat ‚Ä¶

Name: Canvas
Review Text: Very nice place to spend a fun afternoon having a drink with a nice view of Amsterdam. Also suitable for staying longer hours as the restaurant-bar becomes more of a bar-club afterwards.  A recommended place approved by quiqiunn stars

Name: Canvas
Review Text: Great - place - spot - environment - amazing view. ideal to any occasion - any time of the day

Name: Canvas
Review Text: A bit fresh, having to sit outside. 5star view on a better day!!! Canvas cannot help that, covid rules. What cost them a star is the less than perfect coffee after lunch.

Name: Canvas
Review Text: Really good place with good view of the city. Love the lighting and overall ambiance. Offers good food and drinks. The menu is not too big but good variety. Vegan friendly too. Happy and cheerful staff - adds to the whole experience. One must try this place. :)

Name: Canvas
Review Text: We had an amazing experience. The manager on place was very nice and remembered my name, tell me bye by my name. I really enjoyed it. The food was amazing and very not expensive. We had an amazing dinner. Thank you so much

Name: Canvas
Review Text: Food was unfortunately rather poor taste, flavour and quality wise and the portions very small.

Name: Canvas
Review Text: Great spot at the top of the Volkshotel. Loved the atmosphere and left my gf for the oatmeal cookies which came straight from the oven. üòç

Name: Canvas
Review Text: Bar in a hotel but feels much nicer and bigger.  We came from London for NYE here and had a blast. Food was great and on time.  Views are great too.  Staff were really nice, facilities were great although I found it weird that there's HUGE ‚Ä¶

Name: Canvas
Review Text: Great environment and beautiful view on the city

Name: Canvas
Review Text: One on my favorite places in Amsterdam. Great spot

Name: Canvas
Review Text: Good hotel. Even though a bit dark but was interesting. Staff courteous and helpful. Hot tub was way too hot for folks. They were complaining how hot it was and 3rd tub was out of view until you accidentally spot it..water could be cooler ‚Ä¶

Name: Canvas
Review Text: They have good rooms with great foods! The prices are fair and the food quality is high.

Name: Canvas
Review Text: 0-stars! Very annoyed and unfriendly staff. No greetings when you enter the place, barely talking with an unsatisfied facial expression. Forgot our order and wanted us to pay twice for the bill?! ‚Ä¶

Name: Canvas
Review Text: my go to place when I want to disconnect from the fast amsterdam life. Incredible 360 views to contemplate with a fairly priced beer. Never tried the food, but a nice odour emancipating from the kitchen. ü§™

Name: Canvas
Review Text: Great place, beautiful view, friendly staff and good food!

Name: Canvas
Review Text: Nice view and relaxed terrace, really like the venue and chilled atmosphere. Unfortunately the food on the other hand is very average and not at all memorable. Pretty limited menu, vegetarian friend ate something that looked horrible and ‚Ä¶

Name: Canvas
Review Text: Went for dinner on a Wednesday evening. Atmosphere was intimate, lighting and the view was beautiful. Friendly staff and a delicious meal. Ordered the parelgort and stamppot. And for desert had a delicious cheesecake. Would recommend this place.

Name: Canvas
Review Text: Didn't know the place even though I live right around the corner, but a friend recommended it to me. A very cool place to go to. Amazing view of the city at night on top of the hotel. The waiter was extremely friendly and the snacks were excellent. I liked the decoration too.

Name: Canvas
Review Text: Our dinner was... OK. Excellent steak , really... starting with burata and green beans pure.  Cheese plate was a joke.  And service totally unacceptable. This was the first time I have the filling to be unexpected..... not welcome.

Name: Canvas
Review Text: Main courses are very small and too expensive. 5 brussels sprouts cut in half and fried with a spoon of hummus costs 12 euros as a main dish. 5 stars for the view and 1 star for the food

Name: Canvas
Review Text: Sitting outside on the roof terrace enjoying the view, the people and the sun more than their service. When there aren't a lot of guests and you work the area with 3 girls it shouldn't take too long to come bring us the menu, take our ‚Ä¶

Name: Canvas
Review Text: Beautiful view, friendly staff and good drinks.

Name: Canvas
Review Text: Okay food, pricey. Alright for an impromptu, unsatisfactory for a planned night out.

Name: Canvas
Review Text:
The 19.5‚Ç¨ entrecote is a total rip off: meat quality is terrible, the steak is tiny, poorly cooked and over salted. It also does not come with a side.
The salad also needs some improvement, it comes with so much caned chickpeas ‚Ä¶

Name: Canvas
Review Text: Great service and attentive staff. Small food selection but good quality and fairly priced. Unique atmosphere.

Name: Canvas
Review Text: The service is fast and very kind. The atmosphere is always nice and the drinks very good!

Name: Canvas
Review Text: Rooftop bar was only 1/2 full yet it took 20mins for someone to take our order and another 20mins to get served the drinks. Even tried to order at the bar, and was told to order outside. Great spot on a sunny day, but not worth it for the terrible service.

Name: Canvas
Review Text: Very friendly bar staff, fast service, great view from the restaurant. I have been served by Stefan and he really made me feel welcomed and at home. Would definitely recommend to visit.

Name: Canvas
Review Text: Good food, amazing old school DJ, timely and polite service. And to top it off best views in East Amsterdam without the usual rooftop tax in prices.

Name: Canvas
Review Text: I use to visit this place a long time ago when there were still swatters and no hotel. It always stuck in my mind as a great venue due to the high floor, large open air balcony and cocktail menu. ‚Ä¶

Name: Canvas
Review Text: Good view, friendly staff, cheap drinks

Name: Canvas
Review Text: I was very disappointed with my experience last night at Canvas. From the start, the waiter was rude and unprofessional. We were not allowed to sit outside being told that they will close in 15 minutes, although they closed almost an hour ‚Ä¶

Name: Canvas
Review Text: Awesome view, unique place. I‚Äôm not giving 5 starts because some of the dishes were overpriced and not tasty like the steaks that 2 of my friends ordered it was full of nerves not very nice quality. Other than that I really enjoyed the coctels and the live music!!

Name: Canvas
Review Text:
Cocktails are pretty good. Not easy to find relatively decent cocktail for a reasonable price.
Food is pretty good too. Nothing to write home about but ok. In summer, sitting outside with the view is spectacular!

Name: Canvas
Review Text: Awesome rooftop bar with a really cool view of the city. The terrace can be very crowded and the drinks are a tad expensive, but well made. Try the Long Island, they don‚Äôt skimp on the alcohol.

Name: Canvas
Review Text: Great view! Friendly staff. Fantastic place for a night with your loved one. And the best priced rooftop bar ever... üòÉ Don't know about the food, but they do great G&T's

Name: Canvas
Review Text: Very nice rooftop bar/restaurant view nice views. We went here as an alternative to the Skylounge in the central station area which was crazy expensive. The prices here are very affordable, and the food is splendid. Service was a bit lousy but nothing to be worried about. Both ik inside and outside seating.

Name: Canvas
Review Text: I went to the terrace in the summer! I really enjoyed the view but besides that there's not much: there's snacks and finger food for you to try which was tasty. You can reach the terrace by elevator and park behind the place. It's good for you to chat and spend a warm afternoon but do not expect greatness for lunch

Name: Canvas
Review Text: We had a really great dinner at Canvas. Tried steaks and they were delicious! Staff was super nice. Music not so much, but it all depends on a taste.

Name: Canvas
Review Text: Great views. Food was good. Service was very slow. The server was more interested in chatting up the girls at another table than bothering to serve us.

Name: Canvas
Review Text:
Atmosphere was good. But wow the food was so bad. The cabbage with almonds was literally 1/4 of a cabbage, in one piece, on a plate with a few almonds.
And the chicken, what shall I say, KFC chicken is better.

Name: Canvas
Review Text: Great view, but really slow Service.

Name: Canvas
Review Text: Great location and really nice rooftop

Name: Canvas
Review Text: Nice bar and bistro on the 7th floor of the cool Volkshotel. Amazing views over Amsterdam, nice cocktails and nice food. Want something vegan? Just ask and they'll make it for you. On Friday and Saturday nights it turns into a cool club. Worth the trip! Friendly staff too.

Name: Canvas
Review Text: There aren't a lot of rooftop terraces in Amsterdam so this is a great option for a sunny day. The staff is very friendly. Although they did not have any vegan options on the menu the chef was more than happy to prepare me a delicious vegan bulgur salad.

Name: Canvas
Review Text: Nice staff and view. Would recommend for drinks and 'snacks'. Main courses are very small and overpriced.

Name: Canvas
Review Text: One of the best burger in town (check out Volt on FBstraat and the Rotisserie for other contenders) and a great view (7th floor) of the city. Come before 5pm though for the burgers as they change the menu for the evening.

Name: Canvas
Review Text: Mediocre food but that's to be expected with Dutch dishes like bitterballen. However the atmosphere is great and theres a nice view of the city. It also turns into a club at night at the weekend.

Name: Canvas
Review Text: I love this place every time I come to Amsterdam I eat here, amazing setup also the viel croquettes are very good ! Great service overall ! Staff are friendly and helpful !

Name: Canvas
Review Text:
Nice place for some drinks
Would highly recommend it during summer, the view and the weather give the place a special vibe

Name: Canvas
Review Text:
Been there again since the renovation.

The lockers to put your stuff are on the ground floor. So store your stuff ‚Ä¶

Name: Canvas
Review Text: Breakfast was ok ok, not so good. Not worth 13 Euros. If you are vegetarian like me, then won't suggest spending 13 euros for croissant, bread and butter.

Name: Canvas
Review Text: Went for dinner on a Wednesday evening. Atmosphere was intimate, lighting and the view was beautiful. Friendly staff and a delicious meal. Ordered the parelgort and stamppot. And for desert had a delicious cheesecake. Would recommend this place.

Name: Canvas
Review Text: Amazing view and good food. Best for drinks or dinner. Not that good when it comes to parties. Worth checking for sure

Name: Canvas
Review Text:

Review Text: Great place for special occasions. Solid sharing platters, but not the largest menu to choose from. Amazing view of the sunset.
